import React from 'react' const Contact = () => { return (

Contact Us

  • Home
  • Contact Us

Get In Touch

Contact Us

Shop Address

Sarees shop, 10001, 5th Avenue, #06 lane street, NY - 10017.

Call Us

+91(91) 673 4587

Email Us

info@SareesApp.com

Customer Support

support@SareesApp.com

) } export default Contact
